channel.title: esp32 on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in esp32 on Rusty Eddy

item.title: The ESP32
item.description: You need to push the RESET button to get them to write flash. A power packed chip that I have just started playing with. Give some quick specs here: and compare with other well known options (arduino’s, stm32 or Raspberry Pi. Standout Features Builtin Wifi & BT and others Dual Core Powerful esp-idf FreeRTOS (Arduino optional) Great Feature Set! Usage Interactive Console over UART This demonstrates using the serial port for an interactive console while ESP is running other things.
